name: AFL 99
description:
Back of Jewel Case - PlayStation (UK) (from Ad Blurbs)

The big game flies even higher.

Spectacular marks, huge kicks and bone-crushing collisions.

GAME FEATURES
  • OFFICIAL AFL LICENSED PRODUCT
  • CHOOSE YOUR TEAM FROM THE FULL CLUB SQUAD LIST OF UP TO 42 PLAYERS
  • CONTROLLED CHARGE DOWNS
  • KICK LOOSE BALLS ON THE GROUND
  • MULTIPLE DIFFICULTY MODES INCLUDING PICK UP & PLAY CONTROLS
  • OVER 550 MOTION CAPTURED PLAYER MOVES
